channel.title: Rebecca Yarros News Feed
channel.description: News, updates, and features related to author Rebecca Yarros.

item.title: Rebecca Yarros Announces New Book Tour
item.description: Rebecca Yarros is heading out for a multi-city book tour starting this fall. Join her live!

item.title: Fourth Wing Wins Fantasy Book Award
item.description: Rebecca Yarros' hit novel "Fourth Wing" just won the Fantasy Excellence Award for 2025.
